content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.fact_internet_sales') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/fact_internet_sales',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [ProductKey], 
  [OrderDateKey], 
  [CustomerKey], 
  [SalesTerritoryKey], 
  [SalesOrderNumber], 
  [SalesOrderLineNumber], 
  [OrderQuantity], 
  [ProductStandardCost], 
  [SalesAmount], 
  CAST([OrderDate] AS date) AS OrderDate
FROM 
  bronze.fact_internet_sales;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales;
SELECT * FROM silver.fact_internet_sales;
